title: starting to start collecting t206: need help
author: bfrench00

posts.post_title: starting to start collecting t206: need help
posts.post_content: I have been a collector for a while but i have just started on t206 and early 1900s cards. Now i dont have much for trade unless you would trade for my 50s and 60s stars. I am probably buying so and i need some help. Looking for lower grade stuff mostly. Idont care about stars or commons but i need a good deal. Lmk what you have.
